document_data.caption: A map showing Suq Bay and the Cities of the Heart.
document_data.name: Suq Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Suq Bay''' was a vital body of water located in the heart of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: The bay was literally found in the center of the continent of Zakhara. It was bordered to the south by the [[Golden Gulf]], to the north by the [[Furrowed Mountains]], to the east by the [[Haunted Lands]], and to the west by the [[High Desert]].
document_data.Description: Suq Bay was divided into a North Quarter and South Quarter, with a narrow strait connecting the two. Rocky mountainous terrain or desert nearly encircled the entire bay.
